name: Deus Vult (itch) (lampyr)
description:
Deus Vult is a game with two players confronts each other for the supremacy of there conviction. There will be two sides, Holly and Demon, and you will be able to kill all the minions of your opponent. Each player will have to keep safe his own castle, in order to destroy the one of the other player. The first player losing his castle is the loser, the other player win. The battle will take place in an arena with five lanes. Each lane allow a minion of the other player to attack you, and you will have to throw projectiles, to kill them. When a player kill the minions, they become allies and assault with natural spawned allies your enemy. Minions can fight each other, so it is your role to help them to push the lanes.

Attack angel: a

Attack demon : p
